Interface RenderMachineCommands

    RenderMachine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocTester, RenderMachineImpl

    • Method Detail

      • say

        void say(String text)
        A text that will be wrapped inside a paragraph. No escaping is done. You can use your own html tags inside the text.
        Parameters:
        text - A text that may contain html tags like "This is my bold text".

      • sayNextSection

        void sayNextSection(String headline)
        A text that will be wrapped inside a h1. No escaping is done. You can use your own html tags inside the text.
        Parameters:
        headline - A text that may contain html tags like "This is my headline text".

      • sayRaw

        void sayRaw(String rawHtml)
        If you want to let the renderer render some raw custom html use this method.
        Parameters:
        rawHtml - A raw plain html String like "

        Another headline

        "

        List<org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie> sayAndGetCookies()
        Returns:
        all cookies saved by this TestBrowser.
